members.signatureBeforeChange: public void javadocAll(DirectorySelector select, final FileSaveSelector saver, final String classpath)      throws IOException
members.signatureAfterChange: public void javadocAll(DirectorySelector select, final FileSaveSelector saver, final String classpath)      throws IOException
diff: -    // Only javadoc if all are saved.
-    if (_getter.hasModifiedDocuments()) { return; }  /* abort if files remain unsaved */
+    // Only javadoc if all are saved. Removed because it is already done inside suggestJavadocDestination (fixes bug where pop-up is shown twice)
+    if (_getter.hasModifiedDocuments() || _getter.hasUntitledDocuments()) { return; }  /* abort if files remain unsaved */
-      if (doc.isUntitled()) return;  // ignore javadoc, since a document is still unsaved
+//      if (doc.isUntitled()) return;  // ignore javadoc, since a document is still unsaved
-    // first document in docList.  A new file does not appear in docList.
+    // first document in docs.  A new file does not appear in docs.
